title: Celestial Drops: Rose Quartz and Tanzanite Kundan Jhumkas
materials: excellent luster). Features the exquisite Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: These elegant Jhumkas feature a traditional Kundan setting around both the rose quartz and tanzanite stones. The upper portion showcases a beautifully cut square rose quartz encased within a floral-inspired Kundan frame. The lower pendant features a striking pear-shaped Tanzanite, also meticulously set with Kundan, reminiscent of delicate 'jali' work found in Mughal architecture, a signature of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. This creates an airy, captivating design.
colors: Primarily gold with delicate pink from the rose quartz
and a captivating blue-violet from the tanzanite. The clear Kundan stones add a sparkling contrast.
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to traditional Indian attire for events like sangeet
or weddings. Also suitable for a half-saree function (Langa Voni Utsavam).
description: These Jhumkas seamlessly blend traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a contemporary design aesthetic. The use of rare tanzanite and untreated rose quartz provides a unique and valuable touch. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting luster. These earrings offer a distinctive statement of elegance and sophistication, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad.
